name: City Blocks
description:
A Puzzle / Deck-Building / City Planning Game

You have to plan the building of the city. Hire the mayor and evolve your choices through an engaging tech-tree!

After each round of playing, you'll be rewarded with new block to put into your deck, to elaborate on your personal playstyle.

Features

  • Over 30 Blocks Available (No Micro-Transactions).
  • 6 Playable Characters.
  • Multiple Game Modes - Time- and Turn Mode.
  • Minimalistic Artstyle.
